text: Everything revolves around the music when it comes to Tool.
author: Maynard James Keenan

text: After all, in today's music scene every band seems to steal from other bands.
author: Maynard James Keenan

text: Music is my life, it is a reflection of what I go through.
author: Lenny Kravitz

text: There's no religion but sex and music.
author: Sting

text: I have a big problem with piped music. I like either silence or to listen to it properly.
author: Sting
